attributes.action: Bank Holiday if England win the euros!
attributes.additional_details: England have not won an international trophy since 1966 and winning it is a big national achievement which needs to be celebrated.
attributes.background: If england win euro 2020 there should be a bank holiday for in England.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
